title: 100 Pack Kitchen Cabinet Knobs Gold Round Drawer Dresser Handles Kitchen Cabinet Round Pulls Hardware(1.06 Inch)
description: Features:  Suitable application: Applicable to kitchen cabinet, furniture door, cupboard, desk drawer, wardrobe drawers, shoe cabinet, chest, bookcase, and so on.  Install easy: Each knob is equipped with a screw, easy to install and screws securely.  Installation step: 1. Find the position where you want to install on the board and drill a hole. 2. Pass through the screw from the back of board and tighten the knob.  Specifications: Color: gold Material: aluminium alloy Knob diameter: approx. 1.06 inch/ 2.7 cm Base diameter: approx. 0.55 inch/ 1.4 cm Knob height: approx. 0.79 inch/ 2 cm Screws height: approx. 0.87 inch/ 2.2 cm  Package includes:  100 x Knobs 100 x Screws  Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.
